feed.title: Pinkary Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Pinkary: v1.36.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: lint by @awietz in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/475
  • feat: model factory arch test by @awietz in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/476
  • Feat(hashtags) add #hashtag highlighting by @steven-fox in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/478
  • feat(hashtags) Fix html escapes by @steven-fox in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/480
  • feat(hashtags) Do not alter #... found within code/pre blocks by @steven-fox in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/483
  • Lightbox implementation for Post Images by @abishekrsrikaanth in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/485

New Contributors

  • @abishekrsrikaanth made their first contribution in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/485

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/compare/v1.35.0...v1.36.0

entry.title: New release for Pinkary: v1.38.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Add x-intersect.margin.600px to load-more-button by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/488
  • Fix: do not alter links or mentions found within code/pre blocks by @steven-fox in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/486
  • feat: Skip Windows test for UpdateUserAvatarTest by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/487
  • Fixing Scroll Issue and style scrollbars by @abishekrsrikaanth in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/491
  • Navigation alignment by @msamgan in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/493
  • z index hot fix. by @msamgan in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/500
  • Add paste support for images into textarea by @NathanBeddoeWebDev in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/497
  • Fix image lightbox width and post pagination issues by @steven-fox in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/499
  • Fix: Add addition validation rules for max size & ratio by @CamKem in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/504
  • Fix: prevent multiple image pastes by @CamKem in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/509
  • Fix: Escape special characters on remove image in markdown by @CamKem in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/510
  • chore: Update axios dependency to version 1.7.4 by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/511
  • Feat: bookmarks count by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/513
  • Changes the height of the parent questions divider by @xiCO2k in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/512
  • Feat(hashtags): Add hashtag storage and relation syncing by @steven-fox in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/495

New Contributors

  • @msamgan made their first contribution in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/493
  • @NathanBeddoeWebDev made their first contribution in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/497

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/compare/v1.36.0...v1.38.0

entry.title: New release for Pinkary: v1.39.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update Telegram group link in README.md by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/515
  • chore: update URL for source code by @danjohnson95 in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/516
  • fix: Remove duplicated classes from Tailwind CSS safelist by @ozdemirrulass in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/519
  • chore(main): Simplify use for jobs. by @siarheipashkevich in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/517
  • fix: search icon cut off in home menu components by @holiq in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/526
  • replace "1" with Carbon::MONDAY in console.php by @kachelle in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/532
  • Feat: adding spinner in load more by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/537
  • chore: intersect margin value to 50% by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/538
  • Feat: adding bleeding edge in PHPStan by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/535
  • Refactor image upload section in question creation by @ojessecruz in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/533
  • chore: consistency in app service provider by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/534
  • chore: Refactor image upload UI handling by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/540
  • chore: fix width of dropdown in share button of question. by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/541

New Contributors

  • @danjohnson95 made their first contribution in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/516
  • @ozdemirrulass made their first contribution in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/519
  • @siarheipashkevich made their first contribution in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/517
  • @holiq made their first contribution in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/526
  • @kachelle made their first contribution in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/532
  • @ojessecruz made their first contribution in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/533

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/compare/v1.38.0...v1.39.0

entry.title: New release for Pinkary: v1.40.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix: Remove double ignore call in arch tests by @kayintveen in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/546
  • Adding mobile improvements by @tnylea in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/542
  • chore: refresh livewire without stubbed method by @nuernbergerA in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/518
  • Fixed formatting issue in Privacy Policy: removed space before @ in tâ€¦ by @syedmahroof in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/553
  • chore: followup - refresh livewire without stubbed method by @nuernbergerA in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/550
  • chore: fix ignore call in factories arch tests by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/548
  • Revert "chore: refresh livewire without stubbed method" by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/554
  • Feat: threads in feed by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/549
  • chore: minor style fix by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/555
  • refactor: added :key to ignore glitches. by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/558
  • Revert "chore: followup - refresh livewire without stubbed method" by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/557
  • Feat: improve bookmarks and likes by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/567
  • Added target blank to privacy link by @Rattone in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/561
  • fix: about page by @aagjalpankaj in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/562
  • fix: Update upload icon from camera to image icon for clarity by @lewislarsen in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/569
  • Feat(hashtags): Make hashtags in posts a link to hashtag-feed by @steven-fox in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/566
  • feat(hashtags): add SyncMissingQuestionHashtags command by @steven-fox in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/564
  • Change style of default email to improve styles of emails by @darren-glanville in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/560

New Contributors

  • @kayintveen made their first contribution in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/546
  • @tnylea made their first contribution in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/542
  • @nuernbergerA made their first contribution in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/518
  • @syedmahroof made their first contribution in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/553
  • @Rattone made their first contribution in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/561
  • @aagjalpankaj made their first contribution in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/562
  • @lewislarsen made their first contribution in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/569
  • @darren-glanville made their first contribution in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/560

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/compare/v1.39.0...v1.40.0

entry.title: New release for Pinkary: v1.41.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Refactor password input to toggle visibility by @tuvshinjargal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/570
  • Feat: improove animation like bookmark button by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/575
  • Add username validation for alphanumeric characters and underscores only by @ManukMinasyan in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/578
  • Refactor: parent question display in show.blade.php by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/577
  • chore: add type to query by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/573
  • chore: fix test coverage by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/574
  • chore: Add pull_request event to tests.yml workflow by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/559
  • Feat: ignore all notifications by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/576
  • Fix: test suites by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/581

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/compare/v1.40.0...v1.41.0
